Segment.Name: ZEL
Segment.ImpNote: MHV SM Implementation: - this will be a repeating segment only if there is more than one eligibility code available for the patient; - 1st ZEL segment is always for Primary Eligibility; and for Data Classification: Fields 2,8,9,10,18,19,20,23,35,40,42 and 44 are required if data present. - Aditional ZEL segments for Secondary Eligibilities; Fields 5 thru 44 are null.

Field.Name: SET ID - ZEL
Field.Reference: SEQUENTIAL NUMBER (1 is always primary eligibility)

Field.Name: ELIGIBILITY CODE
Field.ImpNote: - first for Primary Eligibilitiesand Aditional ZEL segments for Secondary Eligibilities

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: TYPE OF PATIENT
Field.ImpNote: Inpatient Outpatient Status: - O - Outpatient - I - Inpatient

Field.Name: EXPOSED TO AGENT ORANGE
Field.ImpNote: - 1st ZEL segment is always for Primary Eligibility; and for Data Classification: Fields 2,8,9,10,18,19,20,23,35,40,42 and 44 are required if data present.

Field.Name: RADIATION EXPOSURE INDICATED
Field.ImpNote: - 1st ZEL segment is always for Primary Eligibility; and for Data Classification: Fields 2,8,9,10,18,19,20,23,35,40,42 and 44 are required if data present.

Field.Name: ENVIRONMENTAL CONTAMINANTS
Field.ImpNote: - 1st ZEL segment is always for Primary Eligibility; and for Data Classification: Fields 2,8,9,10,18,19,20,23,35,40,42 and 44 are required if data present.

Field.Name: MST STATUS
Field.ImpNote: - 1st ZEL segment is always for Primary Eligibility; and for Data Classification: Fields 2,8,9,10,18,19,20,23,35,40,42 and 44 are required if data present.
